title: OpenSoundscape
description: software ecosystem for analyzing bioacoustics recordings, training, and applying convolutional neural network classifiers
taxonomicOrSoundTypeSpecializationIfAny: any sound; specific tool for classification of repeating sounds (e.g. trills)
annotation: process Raven sound software annotation files
soundProcessingFeatures: manipulate audio, e.g. bandpass and sound augmentation for convolutional neural network training
detectorFeatures: use signal processing for sounds with repeating structure (e.g. trills)
classifierFeatures: create a wide variety of deep learning networks for classification of animal sounds; parallelize classification over CPUs or GPUs
